_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
Innate: Rengar generates 1 Ferocity upon casting a basic ability or using Savagery's first attack. At 4 Ferocity, his next basic ability consumes them to become empowered with an additional effect and grant him an additional cast along with [[1]] for 1.5 seconds. Reaching 4 Ferocity with Savagery or Bola Strike locks them from use for 0.1 seconds before and after casting. All Ferocity is lost after 10 seconds of being out of combat.
Innate: While in brush, Rengar gains Unseen Predator.
Unseen Predator: Rengar's basic attacks have massively increased range and cause him to leap to the target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal melee range. This generates 1 Ferocity if Rengar had 0 Ferocity at one point. Unseen Predator lingers for 0.35 seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if Rengar casts Flash or Hexflash to do so.
Innate - Bonetooth Necklace: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants Rengar a Trophy, once per unique champion and up to 5. An additional one is made available through the event The Hunt is On! Trophies grant [[0]].

text.text: 1% − 36% {{0}} bonus AD as bonus attack damage

Rengar's next 2 Attacks gain [[0]]. The first Attack critically strikes for [[1]].

[[2]] The first Attack critically strikes for [[3]] and grants Rengar [[4]] for 5 seconds.

Rengar roars, dealing [[0]] to nearby enemies and restoring [[1]] of the damage taken in the last 1.5 seconds as Health.

Rengar throws a bola, dealing [[0]] to the first enemy hit, Revealing and [[1]] them by 30/45/60/75/90% for 1.75 seconds.

[[2]] Deals [[3]] and [[4]] for 1.75 seconds.

[[0]] Rengar will also leap attack when [[1]].

[[2]] Rengar gains [[3]] and [[4]] in a small area around the nearest enemy champion for 12/16/20 seconds.

After 2 seconds, Rengar becomes [[5]] and can leap without being in Brush. Leaping to the nearest champion deals an additional [[6]], shreds [[7]] for 4 seconds, and ends this Ability.

Change.Before: 75% of the damage he's taken from monsters
Change.After: 100% of the damage he's taken from monsters
Change.parsedAfter: 100% of the damage he's taken from monsters

Change.After: W now deals 65-130 (levels 1-18) bonus damage to monsters
Innate - Rengar can leap to enemies with his next basic attack when he is in camouflage
upon losing all Ferocity stacks (no matter how much Ferocity he gains before his next leap)
Change.parsedAfter: upon losing all Ferocity stacks (no matter how much Ferocity he gains before his next leap)

Change.After: Rengar will be able to leap after 0.35 seconds in brush or camouflage (or Senna's E - Curse of the Black Mist camouflage) consistently, rather than based on a 0.3-0.45 second timer (Leap range has been slightly increased to offset variability)

Rengar now has a Ferocity resource bar that indicates how much Ferocity he currently has (Stacks generated by leaps will have a different color so you'll know if you'll gain Ferocity on your next leap)

Change.Attribute: All Ferocity Stacks Fall Off After:
Change.After: 10 seconds out of combat
3 seconds of damaging an enemy champion
Change.parsedAfter: 3 seconds of damaging an enemy champion

Change.After: Rengar's Q-empowered basic attack is now always a critical strike. Instead of regular critical strike damage, each 1% critical strike chance increases this empowered attack's damage by 0.66% (0.99% with Infinity Edge's Perfection passive)
Q - Savagery now also applies to basic attacks against towers
Q - Savagery no longer applies to basic attacks against plants
Rengar can now throw his E - Bola Strike instantly (with zero cast time) during leaps
Now grants true sight and normal vision 150 units around the first enemy hit for 2 seconds
Now grants not only true sight, but also normal vision 100 units around the nearest enemy
